main event: An object hit the water near Glennie, Michigan, creating a circle in the water and sizzling for 1.5 minutes.
interesting points: The object made a loud sound upon hitting the water that was heard two yards away,The circle it made was approximately 10 feet across with foam 2-3 feet high on the edges,The object exhibited a zig-zagging movement across the water for about 200 feet before sinking, Observers noted that it was sizzled as if hot,The sighting lasted for 1.5 minutes.
witness description: One observer in a boat and two others on the lake bank, two hundred yards away.
